column2: "I heard that the inside of the Tunnels are intricate, and really dangerous for anyone but veteran ARKS."
"But I'm sure you'll be okay. I believe in you. I'll wait here."
"Could you teach me about Spargun after it becomes a boost hostile? I implore you."

"よく見るエネミーだからこそ
その違いを知っておいて、警戒し
対応できるようになっておく。"

"……そのために、先輩
協力をお願いします。"
